name: Collecting Points and Not Dying
description:
This is a game where you collect points and avoid dying.

Arrow keys to move.
You move 3 squares in every direction except the one you just took. You move 2 squares in the direction you just took.
You will take damage if you are blue while you are touched by a shimmering pixel.

You will get 1 health back every time you collect 5 points.
